mapper.insert: insert into menu(kor_name, eng_name, price, img, member_id) values (#{korName}, #{engName}, #{price}, #{img}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select m.id, m.kor_name, m.eng_name, m.price, m.img, m.reg_date, m.hit, m.member_id, count(l.menu_id) like_count from menu m left join `like` l on m.id = l.menu_id group by m.id, m.kor_name, m.eng_name, m.price, m.img, m.reg_date, m.hit, m.member_id
